name: v1_iplookup
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ip_lookup_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Look up location information for any valid IP address. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/iplookup.
API description: Performs an IP address lookup using the API Ninjas IP Lookup API.

address.description: IP Address to query. Must be in the format A.B.C.D. For example: 73.9.149.180
